sql: SELECT MIN(chn.name) AS character, MIN(t.title) AS russian_mov_with_actor_producer FROM char_name AS chn, cast_info AS ci, company_name AS cn, company_type AS ct, movie_companies AS mc, role_type AS rt, title AS t WHERE ci.note  like '%(producer)%' AND cn.country_code  = '[ru]' AND rt.role  = 'actor' AND t.production_year > 2010 AND t.id = mc.movie_id AND t.id = ci.movie_id AND ci.movie_id = mc.movie_id AND chn.id = ci.person_role_id AND rt.id = ci.role_id AND cn.id = mc.company_id AND ct.id = mc.company_type_id;
hint_str:
/*+ HashJoin(ci chn t cn mc ct rt)
 HashJoin(ci chn t cn mc ct)
 MergeJoin(cn mc ct)
 MergeJoin(cn mc)
 HashJoin(ci chn t)
 HashJoin(ci chn)
 IndexScan(ci)
 IndexScan(chn)
 BitmapScan(t)
 SeqScan(cn)
 IndexScan(mc)
 TidScan(ct)
 IndexScan(rt)
 Leading(((((ci chn) t) ((cn mc) ct)) rt)) */
